recipe.ingredients: 8 large eggs, 1 cup fresh spinach, chopped, 1/2 cup feta cheese, crumbled, 1/2 cup diced tomatoes, 1/4 cup green onions, chopped, Salt and pepper, to taste, Cooking spray
recipe.directions: Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C). Spray a muffin tin with cooking spray or line with muffin liners, In a large bowl, whisk the eggs until smooth. Add the chopped spinach, feta cheese, diced tomatoes, green onions, salt, and pepper to the egg mixture and stir to combine, Pour the egg mixture evenly into the muffin cups, filling each about two-thirds full. Bake in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until the tops are firm to the touch and eggs are cooked through, Allow the muffins to cool for a few minutes in the muffin tin before removing. Serve warm.
recipe.nutrition: Calories 100, Total fat 7g, Protein 9g, Cholesterol 215mg, Total carbohydrate 2g, Dietary fiber 0g, Saturated fat 3g, Added sugars 0g, Sodium 200mg, Potassium 125mg, Total sugars 1g
